subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Hilary Knight scored in a shootout to deliver a 3-2 victory for the Americans, their third consecutive win over the Canadians this month in pre-Olympic exhibition games.
snippet: Hilary Knight scored in a shootout to deliver a 3-2 victory for the Americans, their third consecutive win over the Canadians this month in pre-Olympic exhibition games.
